content: Type out a movie synopsis for the title, "The Shawshank Redemption"

"The Shawshank Redemption" is a gripping drama that follows the story of Andy Dufresne, a successful banker who is sentenced to life imprisonment at Shawshank State Penitentiary for the murder of his wife and her lover, despite his claims of innocence. Inside the prison, Andy befriends Ellis "Red" Redding, a long-term inmate known for his ability to smuggle items into the facility. Over the years, Andy earns the respect of his fellow inmates and the guards, thanks to his intelligence and resourcefulness.

Using his financial acumen, Andy assists the corrupt warden and prison staff in laundering money, all the while secretly planning his escape. Throughout his time in Shawshank, Andy maintains hope and fosters a sense of freedom within the confines of the prison, inspiring those around him. The film explores themes of friendship, resilience, and the enduring human spirit, culminating in a powerful and unexpected climax. "The Shawshank Redemption" is a tale of redemption, hope, and the unbreakable will to overcome even the most oppressive circumstances.
